body.class: html front not-logged-in no-sidebars page-district-home domain-stvrain-dev-advomatic-com page-panels site-district

br.p:
St. Vrain Valley School District
395 South Pratt Parkway
Longmont, CO 80501

input.title: Enter the terms you wish to search for.
input.name: search_block_form

div.class: views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last suptUpdate

span.a: Superintendent's Update - The Future is in Our Classrooms

div.p:
Dear St. Vrain Valley Community,
Thank you for your outstanding support in championing the growth and development of St. Vrain Valley Schools into a nationally recognized center of excellence for student engagement and 21st-century learning. Your unwavering dedication to the well-being and success of our students, teachers, staff, and schools is a testament to the outstanding community in which we live.

span.a: Family Update: Online Learning Plan and School Closures
Burlington Elementary students expand their global perspective with Up With People
Super Bowl champion talks financial literacy with Niwot High students
Wed 4/22 | Board of Education Regular Meeting
Wed 5/13 | Board of Education Regular Meeting
Wed 5/20 | Board of Education Study Session
Wed 5/27 | Board of Education Regular Meeting
How St. Vrain Valley Schools built trailblazing STEM program
The Next State of Learning: Colorado

li.a: Student Data Transparency and Security Act

div.span: Community Strong makes it easy for organizations to connect and partner with our schools.

li.a: Infinite Visions / EOL / Time Clock Plus

div.p: By executive order from Governor Polis, all schools in St. Vrain, will be closed through April 30. The district will be implementing its online learning plan on March 30.

p.strong: Additional information can be found at http://svvsd.org/coronavirus.

hr.p: Por orden del Gobernador Polis, todas las escuelas en St. Vrain estarán cerradas hasta el 30 de abril de 2020. El aprendizaje en línea comenzará el 30 de marzo.

p.strong: Continuaremos actualizando a los padres a través de nuestro sitio web http://svvsd.org/coronavirus-espanol

div.div: We are giving current and future generations a strong competitive advantage for success in a complex, globalized world. We are the future of America. We are public education proud. We are taking the world by #StVrainStorm.

span.a: Innovation Center’s first Community STEM Night engages PK-5th grade learners, families
Sunset Middle School Eighth Grade Students Create Books for Fall River Kindergarteners
SVVSD starts new Advanced Manufacturing Academy

div.h3: We are the future of America.

p.em: Across all schools in the St. Vrain Valley, our students are advancing excellence and will be the future leaders who will change our world. We are St. Vrain Valley Schools. We are the future of America. We are public education proud.

div.div:
Family Update: Online Learning Plan and School Closures March 26, 2020, 8:44am | St Vrain Valley School District
Dear St. Vrain Valley Families,
Thank you for your continued partnership during this challenging time. I am extremely proud of how our community has come together to ensure that our students will continue to engage in their learning. ...
Read More

Burlington Elementary students expand their global perspective with Up With People February 26, 2020, 3:21pm | St Vrain Valley School District
A global education program, Up With People, visited students at Burlington Elementary School on February 25 to engage students in different multicultural awareness activities. The volunteer group is made up of 80 people from 17 countries, and tours throughout cities across the globe. The group members worked with Burlington students to foster...
Read More

Super Bowl champion talks financial literacy with Niwot High students February 26, 2020, 3:08pm | St Vrain Valley School District
Ryan Harris, Denver Bronco Super Bowl 50 champion and author of “Mindset for Mastery: An NFL Champion’s Guide to Reaching Your Greatness,” visited Niwot High School upperclassmen on February 13 to discuss financial literacy and goal setting with the students. Since retiring from the NFL, Harris has shifted his career to focus on...
Read More

St. Vrain Virtual Teacher Job Fair >> March 13 - April 3 February 21, 2020, 1:30pm | St Vrain Valley School District
Join the St. Vrain Valley Schools team as we work together to advance the future of America.
St. Vrain Valley Schools is looking for outstanding candidates to fill roles as licensed teachers, school counselors, school psychologists, school social workers, physical and occupational therapists, and...
Read More

2020 Superintendent Meetings February 11, 2020, 3:25pm | St Vrain Valley School District
Join the St. Vrain Valley Schools Superintendent and Board of Education to engage in a visioning conversation around the purpose of public education, the future direction of the district, and goals to ensure continued alignment between strategic priorities and community needs.... Read More

div.p: This meeting will begin at 5:30 p.m. with Financials and the Regular Meeting at 6:00 p.m.
This meeting will begin at 6:00 p.m.
This meeting will begin at 6:00 p.m.
This meeting will begin at 5:30 p.m. with Financials and the Regular Meeting at 6:00 p.m.
This meeting will begin at 6:00 p.m.

395 South Pratt Parkway
Longmont, CO 80501
